description: A climate change action plan seeking to achieve this goal is approved by the States of Guernsey.
title: Guernsey 'net zero' emissions target by 2050 to become law
title_page: Guernsey 'net zero' emissions target by 2050 to become law - BBC News
maintext: The action plan also instructs E&I to investigate setting up an independent citizen's assembly, made up of a group of members of the public, to allow islanders to engage with proposals and "help shape the way forward".
